author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: وشرب من أیادي التّسلیم سلسبیل الحیوان وکان من الموقنین ومنهم من قام علی الإعراض وکفر بآیات الله المقتدر العزیز العلیم وقضت القرون وانتهت إلی سیّد الأیّام یوم الّذي
translation: Some were guided by the Light of God, gained admittance into the court of His presence, and quaffed, from the hand of resignation, the waters of everlasting life, and were accounted of them that have truly recognized and believed in Him. Others rebelled against Him, and rejected the signs of God, the Most Powerful, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
